Text: how to start this? it tells me to insert a CD.. any crack?
I am not able to run it. Its looking for a CD. Anybody here who are able to run it? thanks

Ok i got it working pretty quickly on Windows 2000.  

1. Download Power ISO and Deamon Tools
2. Unrar the files
3. Convert the unrared files into an iso file with Power ISO. 
4. Mount the iso using Deamon tools
5. Install and bobs your uncle. 

Thanks uploader for the files but maybe consider giving some instructions on how to get this working next time.
